answers.answer: Hi. Sorry to hear that. But most drs recommend paracetamol for pain relief while pregnant. Perhapz your dr will give u something. Good luck and u r almost through with the journey and soon your precious cargo will arrive. All the best

I hope it's over with soon. I'm ready for the pregnant part to be over. I've had 90% of all pregnancy symptoms.  From low iron, gestational diabetes,  high blood pressure,  swollen feet and hands, migraines, caught the flu, ear infection,  abscess, and alot more. I love my baby but I don't ever want to be pregnant again. I was the child to never get sick and being pregnant has made me more sick then I've been my entire life. I know my son will be worth it but I know I never wanna be pregnant again.

my first two were the best pregnancy s ever, bith i wasnt sick etc this thrid one... ill never do.it afain after this i have had the worst time everrr so so sick... i have one of each... was just about.to schedule my husband and i to be fixed together and then boom suprise.. lol.. love my babies... hate how i feel right now! wabt this over.

question: I'm 39 weeks and I have developed an ear infection over the weekend.  This Morning Has Been The Worst. It's in both ears now. Left side is worse. I have a doctors appointment later own today but I do not know what to do about this pain till then. Becoming really unbearable.  What can I do to relieve some pain. I'm starting not to hear as well.
title: Pain relief.  . . . .
